metadata.title: CVE-2023-32439 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue isfixed in iOS 16.5.1 and iPadOS 16.5.1, iOS 15.7.7 and iPadOS 15.7.7, macOSVentura 13.4.1, Safari 16.5.1. Processing maliciously crafted web contentmay lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that thisissue may have been actively exploited.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-32439` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.40.4-0ubuntu0.23.04.1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
